details.description: At Platform Coffee, we’re all about people — building community, making connections, and serving exceptional coffee along the way. We roast all our coffee right here in Charlotte, so every cup is as fresh as it gets. Whether you’re stopping in for your daily go-to or meeting up with a friend, our team is here to welcome you with genuine hospitality and make every visit feel special.

raw_data.name: Platform Coffee
raw_data.description: At Platform Coffee, we’re all about people — building community, making connections, and serving exceptional coffee along the way. We roast all our coffee right here in Charlotte, so every cup is as fresh as it gets. Whether you’re stopping in for your daily go-to or meeting up with a friend, our team is here to welcome you with genuine hospitality and make every visit feel special.

reviews_data.review_text:
Nice coffee shop on Monroe. Great selection of coffee drinks including the classics (cappuccino, latte, cortado) as well as both normal and nitro cold brew. I hear they also have some “off menu” drinks that I didn’t get to try but sound awesome.

I ended up with the pour over which was excellent. Platform roasts their own beans locally and this was made with the Ethiopian beans which were really good.

Seating is expansive and comfortable, lots of space to stretch out and work.

I will definitely come back and buy some beans for my own use as well as try some of their specialty drinks.
The manager, I think her name is Ashlyn, was  so kind and helpful! Amazing space and amazing staff!
I got an iced latte and the cinnamon bun, both were delicious and the staff was super helpful and friendly! I paid 12$ for both items

So glad this coffee shop opened here.  I’ve been going to a nearby shop for years but it has gotten so busy I can’t hear myself think in there.  I tried this today and was served a delicious large mocha and warmed blueberry muffin by a wonderfully nice barista.  Great space, super clean, peaceful atmosphere (even with 12 other people sitting drinking coffee).  I’ll be making this my new coffee shop for sure!
Coffee and service was outstanding!
This is one of the best coffees I’ve ever had! 10/10 definitely recommend
Amazing people and great service!! Drinks and food were great. Overall 10/10. Vince, my coworker, says, “This is one of the best coffees I’ve ever had!”
Quick, kind, quality service! A must go-to while in the area!! And perfect for meeting up with others, working, etc :)
reviews_data.owner_answer: Really appreciate the kind words! Feel free to spread the word and share with your friends —we’d love to welcome them too.

reviews_data.review_text: Great location, and even better coffee and employees!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for being with us! We’re really excited about our new location and stoked about our team that brings the coffee and hospitality every day.

reviews_data.review_text: Some mom friends and I spent a morning here on opening weekend and absolutely LOVED the experience! Josh was so gracious and welcoming, the scones were life changing, and the coffee was perfect as always! Can’t wait to go back, so excited to have a Platform on this side of town!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much, Abigail! We’re grateful you and your friends had such a great morning with us. Josh will be so happy to hear that —he truly loves making everyone feel welcome. And yes, those scones really are something special! We’re excited to have you as part of our community here on this side of town. Can’t wait to see you all back soon! 💛

reviews_data.review_text: Great spot & team. Very friendly and good coffee
reviews_data.owner_answer: Appreciate that, Will! We’ve got a pretty special crew here, and it means a lot to see that come through. Come hang anytime!

reviews_data.review_text: such a vibey spot! the coffee was amazing as well as the chai latte we got!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: So glad the coffee and chai hit the spot. Next time, try a scone too… just sayin’. 😉 We can’t wait to have you back for round two!

reviews_data.review_text:
This place is so cool!
My girlfriend and I went there and we were immediately greeted by the baristas and even one of the owners! Excellent customer service, great coffee, great pastries, and a great atmosphere!! We loved it and will definitely come back again soon!
reviews_data.owner_answer: This made our day! So glad you two stopped by and had a great experience —from the coffee to the crew. Come hang out with us again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Loved visiting Platform on their opening weekend. It was such a relaxing and spacious place to to work and chat with friends. THE most delicious scones made in house and I tried a honey cinnamon latte and it was 👌🏼.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Julie, we’re so glad you came by during our first weekend in Matthews! It means a lot that you enjoyed the space —and yes, our pastry chef seriously nails those scones. The honey cinnamon latte is a fave around here too. Can’t wait to have you back for more hangs and good coffee!

reviews_data.review_text: Great service and coffee ❤️ 10/10 recommend 😊😊
reviews_data.owner_answer: We really appreciate the love, Josselyn! Can’t wait to have you back for another great cup. ☕️✨

reviews_data.review_text: Friendly staff, delicious coffee, and plenty of seating.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks, Josh! It means a lot to hear that. Our team has poured so much heart into this space — from the coffee we roast, to the kind of hospitality our amazing staff brings every day. Can’t wait to keep filling these seats with friends old and new.

reviews_data.review_text: First review. First day. Good spacious coffee shop with options of soft and table seating. Fridge offering sparkling and regular (non-sparkling) water as well as soda options. The staff is friendly and treat everyone with respect. I look forward to spending time here using this as a space to connect with others.

review_questions.Parking options: Free parking lot, Free street parking

reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for being with us on our first day at the new Matthews location! We’re so glad you felt welcomed — our team works hard to create a warm space for everyone. Can’t wait to have you back as you connect and make it your own!
